function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Domination of techno-scientific concepts over politico-economic factors in delineating causal factors for disease transmission","Impact":"Ill-conceived interventions targeting the urban poor and informal spaces","Mitigation":"Integration of politico-economic factors into disease intervention strategies","Technologies":"Integrated disease modeling and socio-economic data analysis","People":"Urban poor, inhabitants of informal spaces","Owner":"Policy makers, urban planners"},{"Description":"Inequity in access to basic infrastructure and exposure to environmental contamination","Impact":"Maintenance of a threshold density of susceptible hosts in the population","Mitigation":"Improvement of infrastructure and reduction of environmental contamination in marginalized areas","Technologies":"Urban infrastructure development, environmental impact assessment tools","People":"Marginalized communities, urban dwellers","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Spatial segregation of socioeconomic groups leading to disproportionate exposure to environmental toxins and pollutants","Impact":"Enhanced exposure to disease vectors and pathogens","Mitigation":"Policies to reduce spatial segregation and environmental pollution in urban areas","Technologies":"GIS mapping, urban planning software","People":"Socioeconomically segregated communities","Owner":"Local government, urban planning authorities"}]}
